verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's charitable foundation [V: has] been accused of persistently violating state and federal law as part of a new lawsuit seeking its dissolution .
President Donald Trump 's charitable foundation has [V: been] accused of persistently violating state and federal law as part of a new lawsuit seeking its dissolution .
